trans-unit.source: River Bear
trans-unit.target: River Bear

trans-unit.source: Islandwalk (If defending player has any islands in play, River Bear can't be blocked.)
trans-unit.target: Islandwalk (If defending player has any islands in play, River Bear can't be blocked.)

trans-unit.source: The bears had been isolated on an island for hundreds of years, until the island sank and the bears didn't.
trans-unit.target: The bears had been isolated on an island for hundreds of years, until the island sank and the bears didn't.

trans-unit.source: Salvage
trans-unit.target: Salvage

trans-unit.source: Take any one card from your graveyard and put that card on the top of your library.
trans-unit.target: Take any one card from your graveyard and put that card on the top of your library.

trans-unit.source: "What was taken shall be restored."\n—Arathel, elvish queen
trans-unit.target: "What was taken shall be restored."\n—Arathel, elvish queen

trans-unit.source: Sylvan Basilisk
trans-unit.target: Sylvan Basilisk

trans-unit.source: If Sylvan Basilisk attacks and is blocked, destroy all creatures blocking it. (Destroy the creatures before they deal damage. The Basilisk doesn't damage your opponent.)
trans-unit.target: If Sylvan Basilisk attacks and is blocked, destroy all creatures blocking it. (Destroy the creatures before they deal damage. The Basilisk doesn't damage your opponent.)

trans-unit.source: Sylvan Yeti
trans-unit.target: Sylvan Yeti

trans-unit.source: Sylvan Yeti has power equal to the number of cards you have in your hand.
trans-unit.target: Sylvan Yeti has power equal to the number of cards you have in your hand.

trans-unit.source: The deeper the wood, the greater its strength.
trans-unit.target: The deeper the wood, the greater its strength.

trans-unit.source: Tree Monkey
trans-unit.target: Tree Monkey

trans-unit.source: Tree Monkey can block creatures with flying.
trans-unit.target: Tree Monkey can block creatures with flying.

trans-unit.source: "They serve the world best on a platter with shallots and onions."\n—Talas sailor
trans-unit.target: "They serve the world best on a platter with shallots and onions."\n—Talas sailor

trans-unit.source: Untamed Wilds
trans-unit.target: Untamed Wilds

trans-unit.source: Search your library for a plains, island, swamp, mountain, or forest card and put that land into play. Shuffle your library afterwards.
trans-unit.target: Search your library for a plains, island, swamp, mountain, or forest card and put that land into play. Shuffle your library afterwards.

trans-unit.source: Wild Ox
trans-unit.target: Wild Ox

trans-unit.source: Swampwalk (If defending player has any swamps in play, Wild Ox can't be blocked.)
trans-unit.target: Swampwalk (If defending player has any swamps in play, Wild Ox can't be blocked.)

trans-unit.source: It has the run of the swamps, and it knows it.
trans-unit.target: It has the run of the swamps, and it knows it.
